name: A thin man Johnny Depp
short_description:
Filming of the fourth "Pirates of the Caribbean" will soon come to an end , but Johnny Depp was so pleased to work with director Rob Marshall, the actor talked him almost immediately to begin shooting next picture. New work by creative duo Depp - Marshall will be a remake of the 1934 detective melodrama " The Thin Man ".

A screen version of Dashiell Hammett's classic of the genre at the time attracted many prestigious awards five awards " Oscar" awards and several other film festivals. Last remake of " The Thin Man " is dated 1947 .

Johnny Depp is going to play a retired drink too much police investigating the murder of a secretary eccentric inventor .
